Welcome to Webmaker. Let's get you start.message: Welcome to Webmaker. Let's get you started.

p1WelcomeToMozillaWebmaker.message: Welcome to Mozilla Webmaker! Thank you for joining us to discover, create and share the Web. I'm looking forward to seeing what you create.

p2GetStarted.message: Here are some of the fun things you can do with the new Webmaker app:
p2GetStarted.description: Welcome email start of list of things to do with Webmaker

li1Discover.message: Discover: Explore what your fellow Webmakers have already created in the Discover gallery. There are scrapbooks, photo galleries, comics and more, much of it made in your local community.

li2Create.message: Create: Remix a project from the gallery or start from scratch. It's easy to create your own meme, family album or choose-your-own adventure game. The possibilities are endless.

li3Share.message: Share: When your new masterpiece is finished, show it off to your friends, family or community. It's easy to share on the Web, via SMS or your favorite social network.

lastParagraph.message: I'm so glad you've joined the Webmaker community. Together, we can build a Web that's open and made for everyone. If you have questions, feel free to email me or tweet @webmaker.

unsubscribe.message: If you do not wish to receive any more emails from Mozilla Webmaker, you can change your email preferences.
